info.title: Squirrels APIs for 'Sample Project - Expenses'
info.description: For specifying parameter selections to dataset APIs, you can choose between using query parameters with the GET method or using request body with the POST method

get.description: Get list of available authentication providers

schema.title: Response Get Providers Api Squirrels V0 Project Sample V1 Providers Get

get.description: Get OAuth login URL for the provider

put.description: Change the password for the current user

get.description: Get all API keys with title for the current user

schema.title: Response Get All Api Keys Api Squirrels V0 Project Sample V1 Tokens Get

post.description: Create a new API key for the user

schema.title: Response Create Api Key Api Squirrels V0 Project Sample V1 Tokens Post

get.description: Get details of the user fields

schema.title: Response Get User Fields Api Squirrels V0 Project Sample V1 User Fields Get
Response List All Users Api Squirrels V0 Project Sample V1 Users Get

post.description: Add a new user by providing details for username, password, and user fields

put.description: Update the user of the given username given the new user details

get.summary: Get catalog of datasets and dashboards available for user
get.description:
Get catalog of datasets and dashboards available for the authenticated user.

For admin users, this endpoint will also return detailed information about all models and their lineage in the project.

Selections of one parameter may cascade the available options in another parameter. For example, if the dataset has parameters for 'country' and 'city', available options for 'city' would depend on the selected option 'country'. If a parameter has 'trigger_refresh' as true, provide the parameter selection to this endpoint whenever it changes to refresh the parameter options of children parameters.

materialization.title: Materialization
materialization.description: The materialization of the model (ignored if Python model which is always a table)

parameters.title: Parameters
parameters.description: The list of all parameters in the project

connections.title: Connections
connections.description: The list of connections in the project (only provided for admin users)

models.title: Models
models.description: The list of data models in the project (only provided for admin users)

lineage.title: Lineage
lineage.description: The lineage information between data assets (only provided for admin users)

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of the column such as 'string', 'integer', 'float', 'boolean', 'datetime', etc.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: The condition of when the column is included

category.description: The category of the column, either 'dimension', 'measure', or 'misc'

pass_through.title: Pass Through
pass_through.description: Whether the column should be passed through to the federate

result_format.description: The format of the dashboard's result API response (one of 'png' or 'html')
